openrndr/openrndr-guide.description: Source for https://guide.openrndr.org/. Pull requests are welcome on the dev branch.

openrndr/openrndr-template.description: What most users should clone to get started.

openrndr/orx.description: Extensions, known in other frameworks as addons or libraries.

openrndr/openrndr-examples.description: Contains runnable examples from the guide.

openrndr/awesome-openrndr.description: Community maintained list of OPENRNDR based and related projects (this document).

openrndr/workshop-greyspace.description: Project files for the OPENRNDR work at the Grey Space in The Middle. Covers audio, video, MIDI and OSC

openrndr/openrndr-tutorials.description: Superseeded by the guide and the examples.

openrndr/openrndr-panel.description: UI toolkit. Was merged into orx.

edwinRNDR/poc-orx-olive.description: Live coding with OPENRNDR. Was merged into orx.

edwinRNDR/equirectangular-reprojection.description: Simple OPENRNDR shader based program for reprojection equirectangular maps

edwinRNDR/numate.description: Proof-of-concept for interactive animation library (for OPENRNDR)

edwinRNDR/openrndr-demo-template.description: Template project intended for creating demos using OPENRNDR and BASS

edwinRNDR/pellet.description: Kotlin wrappers and OPENRNDR bindings for the Beads sound synthesis library

edwinRNDR/wfc.description: Wave-function collapse library for Kotlin + OPENRNDR helpers. Useful to generate 2D and 3D worlds.

boydhont/Lunar-OpenRNDR.description: A lightweight parametric design library for the minimalist, an implementation for OPENRNDR

BoydRotgans/goodgovernment.description: Interactive tool for building correlation maps between governments worldwide.

CreativeCodeBerlin/FrequentlyAsked.description: A growing list of frequently asked questions and resources for creative code beginners

fal-works/openrndr-sketches.description: Creative coding sketches written with Kotlin and OPENRNDR.

mhaqs/learning-openrndr.description: A repository of examples ported from Open sourced projects to OPENRNDR

morisil/openrndr-camera-filter.description: Live streaming of your live coding in OPENRNDR

morisil/serca-alana.description: Live camera shader filter made during the 4th online Creative Code Jam edition on 20.06.2020

Ptit-Biscuit/SolarSystem.description: Simple seeded solar system in Kotlin using Openrndr

reinvdwoerd/reaction-diffusion-openrndr.description: Reaction Diffusion and much more in OPENRNDR

ricardomatias/openrndr-code-pong.description: A collaborative creative game between @hamoid and @ricardomatias. They take turns and push small changes to the code, see where it leads to.

runwayml/OpenRNDR.description: A collection of examples and tutorials on how to use RunwayML with OPENRNDR.

ryanbateman/openrndr-boids.description: An implementation of the Boids algorithm using OPENRNDR, a Kotlin-based creative coding framework

TomasVolker/openrndr-math.description: Extensions for OPENRNDR for mathematical visualization

xemantic/xemantic-openrndr-template.description: openrndr template project containing xemantic-openrndr libraries

xemantic/xemantic-openrndr.description: OPENRNDR extensions which are too specific to my work to be contributed back, still worth sharing

ylegall/openrndr-utils.description: a collection of utilities for the OPENRNDR framework

Yvee1/openRNDR-circle-packing.description: Circle packing to test out OPENRNDR and Kotlin

urls.name: doodles wall
urls.description: A thread with images generated by various users of OPENRNDR.
